name: ARCHURRY
description:
IMPORTANT if you're trying to play with only Xbox controllers : The runner input isin't used until a left mouse click, this is not part of the intended comportment.

Use an Xbox controller for both players, the left joystick controls the aim/movement depending on the role and the A button either makes the character fire (keep pressed and release for higher force) while it makes the runner jump. 

You can also play with only keyboard/mouse : asdw controls the runner's movement, spacebar makes him jump, the mouse controls the archer's aim and you charge up your crossbow with the left mouse click, then release.

Game realized at the 2018 game jam of jan. 5-7 by the team TANZ. This game was developped with the Unreal Engine 4.16.3 and built for Windows 10 64-bit.

TANZ : Taupes Aquatiques de la Nouvelle-Zélande.

Composed of :  BOISMENU, Louis-Alex, FORTIN, Vincent, GOUIN, Charles-Étienne, LAN-ANH NGUYEN, Éliane, PRIVOROTSKY, Daniel & VASSEVA, Emili.
